item.title: 美国大型银行有望通过压力测试并提高股息
item.description: 分析师表示，美国最大的贷款机构今年有望通过美联储的年度体检，这表明它们拥有充足的资本，可以用来提高股息。【原文：The biggest U.S. lenders are expected to clear the Federal Reserve's annual health check this year, showing they have ample capital that can be used to boost dividends, analysts said.】

item.title: 早间竞价石油、利率和美元暴跌
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 美国安全委员会将审查波音公司在 737 MAX 9 中空紧急事件中的作用
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会将于周二举行听证会，以确定2024年1月一架新波音737 MAX 9航班在飞行途中机舱面板爆炸的可能原因，该事故使该飞机制造商陷入重大危机。【原文：The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board will hold a hearing on Tuesday to determine the probable cause of a mid-air cabin panel blowout of a new Boeing 737 MAX 9 flight in January 2024 that spun the planemaker into a major crisis.】

item.title: LanceDB 为多模态人工智能数据基础设施融资 3000 万美元
item.description: 人工智能数据基础设施公司LanceDB周二表示，该公司获得了3000万美元的A轮融资。【原文：Artificial intelligence data infrastructure company LanceDB raised a $30 million series A round, the company said Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道博斯蒂克：美联储应在物价上涨预期下等待降息
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）告诉路透社记者，由于企业计划在今年晚些时候提高价格以应对更高的进口税，而且就业市场仍然稳定，美联储无需降息。【原文：The Federal Reserve need not cut interest rates with companies planning to raise prices later this year in response to higher import taxes and with the job market still stable, Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic told Reuters.】

item.title: 鲍威尔留任美联储，特朗普的任命可能受限
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周二将开始为期两天的国会作证，他因没有降息而遭到唐纳德-特朗普总统的抨击，但由于最高法院上个月的一项裁决，他作为央行行长的地位似乎得到了保障，不会被总统采取任何行动。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell begins two days of congressional testimony on Tuesday under fire from President Donald Trump for not cutting interest rates but with his status as head of the central bank seemingly secured from any presidential action by a Supreme Court ruling last month.】

item.title: 消费者组织称，特朗普撤销 CFPB 令美国人损失 180 亿美元
item.description: 据两家机构周二发布的一份分析报告称，唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国消费者金融保护局的迅速撤消使美国人损失了至少 180 亿美元，包括更高的费用和据称被大公司欺骗的消费者的赔偿损失。【原文：President Donald Trump's rapid pullback of the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has cost Americans at least $18 billion in higher fees and lost compensation for consumers allegedly cheated by major companies, according to an analysis released Tuesday by two organizations.】

item.title: 独家报道：美元主导地位减弱，各国央行盯上黄金、欧元和人民币
item.description: 随着世界贸易的分裂和地缘政治的动荡引发了对资金流动的重新思考，全球央行数万亿美元储备的保管人正着眼于从美元转向黄金、欧元和中国的人民币。【原文：The custodians of trillions of dollars of global central bank reserves are eyeing a move away from the greenback into gold, the euro and China's yuan as the splintering of world trade and geopolitical upheaval spark a rethink of financial flows.】

item.title: 福特因车辆部件脱落在美国召回近 13.3 万辆 "飞行者 "越野车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，福特将在美国召回132,914辆Aviator越野车，原因是包括后车门车窗杆在内的零部件因粘附力不足而从车上脱落。【原文：Ford is recalling 132,914 Aviator SUVs in the U.S. over parts, including rear door window bars, getting detached from the vehicle due to insufficient adhesion, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国批准阿斯利康和第一制药的肺癌治疗方案
item.description: 阿斯利康（AstraZeneca）周二表示，美国监管机构已批准其精准药物 Datroway 用于治疗一种肺癌。【原文：AstraZeneca said on Tuesday that U.S. regulators have approved its precision drug Datroway to treat a type of lung cancer, adding that the drugmaker would now pay partner Daiichi Sankyo $45 million in milestone-related considerations.】

item.title: 韩国央行副行长称宜逐步引入稳定币
item.description: 韩国央行高级副行长表示，最好以循序渐进的方式引入以韩元计价的稳定币，首先是严格监管的商业银行。【原文：The senior deputy governor of South Korea's central bank said it was desirable to introduce won-denominated stablecoins at a gradual pace, first with rigorously-regulated commercial banks.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发欧洲金属生产商呼吁限制废钢出口
item.description: 欧盟的金属生产商正在游说该集团 "在未来几周内 "对废金属运输征收出口关税或采取限制措施，以阻止特朗普政府的贸易政策导致流向美国的废金属急剧增加。【原文：Metal producers in the European Union are lobbying the bloc to impose export duties or curbs on scrap metal shipments "in the next few weeks" to stem a sharp increase in flows to the United States caused by the Trump administration's trade policies.】

item.title: 从罐头到纸箱：特朗普的金属关税如何影响货架上的包装
item.description: 安迪-鲁西克（Andy Russick）向克罗格（Kroger）等美国顶级杂货商、医院和学校销售水果和番茄罐头，他赞同美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易战背后的既定目标--打击廉价的中国进口商品。【原文：Andy Russick, who sells canned fruit and tomatoes to top U.S. grocers like Kroger , hospitals and schools, shares the stated aim behind U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war - fighting cheap Chinese imports.】

item.title: 为什么特斯拉推出机器人出租车是件容易的事
item.description: 特斯拉终于有了一辆机器人出租车。现在，最困难的部分来了。【原文：Tesla finally has a robotaxi. Now comes the hard part.】

item.title: 印度亿万富翁阿达尼称集团无人被控违反《反海外腐败法》和妨碍司法公正
item.description: 阿达尼集团董事长高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）周二向股东发表讲话时说，阿达尼集团没有任何人被指控违反美国《反海外腐败法》（FCPA）或密谋妨碍司法公正。【原文：No one from Adani Group has been charged with violating U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) or conspiring to obstruct justice, Chairman Gautam Adani said, while addressing shareholders on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国利率至少应降低两到三个百分点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，利率至少应降低两到三个百分点，如果情况变得不利，美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）可以在晚些时候提高利率。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said interest rates should be at least two to three points lower and the U.S. Federal Reserve could increase them later if things turned negative.】

item.title: 英国计划加强对谷歌搜索的控制
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周二表示，建议赋予谷歌 "战略市场地位"，以加强对这家美国科技巨头如何运营搜索服务的控制。【原文：Britain's competition regulator on Tuesday said it was proposing to designate Google with "strategic market status" to give it greater control over how the U.S. tech giant operates search services.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构与 YouTube 就 16 岁以下青少年社交媒体禁令发生争执
item.description: 周二，澳大利亚互联网监管机构和 YouTube 互不相让，因为监管机构敦促政府撤销对 Alphabet 旗下视频共享平台的豁免计划，使其免受全球首个青少年社交媒体禁令的约束。【原文：Australia's internet watchdog and YouTube exchanged barbs on Tuesday after the regulator urged the government to reverse a planned exemption for the Alphabet-owned video-sharing platform from its world-first teen social media ban.】

item.title: 受油轮供应紧张和中东冲突影响，液化天然气运价创 8 个月新高
item.description: 在中东冲突升级的同时，由于更多的船只转向亚洲，船舶供应紧张，液化天然气货物的航运成本已升至约八个月来的最高点。【原文：Shipping costs for liquefied natural gas cargoes have rallied to their highest in about eight months with vessel availability tightened by a shift in more ships heading to Asia at the same time as conflict has escalated in the Middle East.】

item.title: 台湾华航因波音 787 延期而推迟老旧飞机的退役时间
item.description: 台湾华航新任命的董事长表示，由于波音787-9喷气式飞机延迟交付，华航将推迟部分老旧飞机的退役时间，这可能导致飞机制造商支付赔偿金。【原文：Taiwan's China Airlines is postponing the retirement of some of its older aircraft due to delays in getting Boeing 787-9 jets that may result in compensation payments from the planemaker, the carrier's newly appointed chairman said.】

item.title: 法国 SBF120 新贵 OVH 公布第三季度收入增长 9.3
item.description: 法国云服务提供商OVH周四公布，受公共云服务需求强劲的推动，第三季度营收增长9.35%，达到2.72亿欧元（约合2.87亿美元），并重申了全年业绩预期。【原文：French cloud services provider OVH on Thursday reported a 9.35% rise in third-quarter revenue to 272 million euros ($287 million), driven by strong demand for its Public Cloud services, and reaffirmed its full-year forecast.】

item.title: 早间新闻特朗普吹捧 "永久 "停火，石油价格下滑
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 美韩贸易部长重申达成关税协议的承诺
item.description: 韩国贸易、工业和能源部（Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy）周二表示，美国和韩国贸易部长在周一的会议上重申了尽早达成关税协议的承诺。【原文：United States and South Korean trade ministers reaffirmed their commitment to reaching a deal on tariffs as early as possible during a meeting on Monday, South Korea's Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本最高外汇外交官三村（Mimura）将连任两年
item.description: 日本财务省周二表示，日本最高外汇外交官三村敦史连任第二年，他仍是日本美国关税谈判团队的重要成员。【原文：Japan's top foreign exchange diplomat, Atsushi Mimura, was reappointed for a second year, the finance ministry said on Tuesday, as he remains a vital member of the country's U.S. tariff negotiations team.】

item.title: 高盛任命 Aek Shyam 为全球房地产集团并购部主管
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，高盛已任命 Aekloveya Shyam 为全球房地产集团兼并与收购 (M&A) 主管。【原文：Goldman Sachs has appointed Aekloveya Shyam as head of mergers & acquisitions (M&A) in the Global Real Estate Group, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 力拓与汉考克勘探公司将开发价值 16.1 亿美元的 Hope Downs 2 项目
item.description: 澳大利亚力拓公司（Rio Tinto）和汉考克勘探公司（Hancock Prospecting）周二表示，将投资 16.1 亿美元开发位于西澳大利亚皮尔巴拉地区的霍普唐斯 2 号铁矿石项目。【原文：Australia's Rio Tinto , and Hancock Prospecting will invest $1.61 billion to develop the Hope Downs 2 iron ore project in Western Australia's Pilbara region, Rio Tinto said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 星巴克称目前不考虑全面出售中国业务
item.description: 在中国财经杂志《财新》报道了美国连锁咖啡馆星巴克未透露从何处获得的信息后，星巴克表示目前不考虑全面出售其在中国的业务。【原文：U.S. cafe chain Starbucks said it is not currently considering a full sale of its China operations, after Chinese financial magazine Caixin reported that it was without disclosing where it obtained the information.】

item.title: 阿达尼的孟买机场与阿波罗领导的投资集团达成 7.5 亿美元协议
item.description: 美国私人资本集团阿达尼机场控股公司（Adani Airport Holdings）的子公司孟买国际机场有限公司（Mumbai International Airport Ltd）周一表示，该公司已获得由阿波罗管理基金的附属公司和其他长期支持者牵头的集团投资的 7.5 亿美元。【原文：Mumbai International Airport Ltd, a subsidiary of Adani Airport Holdings, has secured a $750 million investment from a group led by affiliates of Apollo-managed funds and other long-term backers, the U.S. private capital group said on Monday.】

item.title: 陷入危机的日产汽车准备在股东大会上接受扭亏为盈计划的审查
item.description: 在本周二举行的年度股东大会上，日产汽车将就其日益加深的危机面临大量审查，投资者还将就一项激进提案进行投票，该提案敦促日产汽车对上市子公司日产夏特采取行动。【原文：Nissan Motor will face plenty of scrutiny over its deepening crisis at an annual general meeting on Tuesday, where investors will also vote on an activist proposal urging it to take action on listed subsidiary Nissan Shatai .】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司任命黄金海岸赌场临时首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚赌场集团 Star Entertainment 周二表示，已任命詹妮弗-克罗宁（Jennifer Cronin）为旗下 Star Gold Coast 赌场的临时首席执行官。【原文：Australian casino group Star Entertainment said on Tuesday it has appointed Jennifer Cronin as the interim chief executive officer for its Star Gold Coast casino.】
